As for getting smartphones out there, Eric Schmidt argues Google can have a pretty big impact. We envision literally a billion people getting inexpensive, browser-based touchscreen phones over the next few years, he wrote. Piers Morgan laughs and says he appreciates her honesty. They then bet 200 British pounds on who will get the first Michael Vick interview between them.
